SEARCH
Package cz.cuni.mff.java.grapher

Class GraphSettings

java.lang.Object
cz.cuni.mff.java.grapher.GraphSettings
public class GraphSettings extends Object
Keeps the settings for a GraphDisplay instance, which it is linked to. Also handles the changing of properties of selected elements of the GraphDisplay as the settings are changed. May also update selections on RecentColors and ShapeSelection instances as they are selected.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    GraphSettings.Action
    enum of all the possible actions that can be set with GraphSettings.

  • Constructor Details

    • GraphSettings

      public GraphSettings(Color color, ShapeSelection.Shape shape, GraphSettings.Action action)
      Constructs a new GraphSettings instance.
      Parameters:
      color - initial Color
      shape - initial ShapeSelection.Shape
      action - initial GraphSettings.Action

  • Method Details

    • setDisplay

      public void setDisplay(GraphDisplay display)
      Connects a GraphDisplay instance to the GraphSettings. Should always be called before the GraphSettings instance is used.
      Parameters:
      display - GraphDisplay instance to connect

    • setColorPane

      public void setColorPane(RecentColors colorPane)
      Connects a RecentColors instance to the GraphSettings. Calling this method allows the GraphSettings to update the color selection as the settings are changed.
      Parameters:
      colorPane - RecentColors instance to connect

    • setShapeSelection

      public void setShapeSelection(ShapeSelection shapeSelection)
      Connects a ShapeSelection instance to the GraphSettings. Calling this method allows the GraphSettings to update the shape selection as the settings are changed.
      Parameters:
      shapeSelection - ShapeSelection instance to connect

    • getColor

      public Color getColor()
      Get the currently selected color.
      Returns:
      Color

    • setColor

      public void setColor(Color color)
      Select color in the settings and update the linked RecentColors instance. IMPORTANT: if updating the settings from the linked RecentColors instance, never use this method, use setColorNoPanelSelect(Color) instead.
      Parameters:
      color - Color to select

    • setColorNoPanelSelect

      public void setColorNoPanelSelect(Color color)
      Select color in the settings without triggering the RecentColors selection update. IMPORTANT: if updating the settings from the linked RecentColors instance, always use this method and never setColor(Color) to avoid a cycle.
      Parameters:
      color - Color to select

    • getShape

      public ShapeSelection.Shape getShape()
      Get the currently selected shape.
      Returns:
      ShapeSelection.Shape

    • setShape

      public void setShape(ShapeSelection.Shape shape)
      Select shape in the settings and update the linked ShapeSelection instance. IMPORTANT: if updating the settings from the linked ShapeSelection instance, never use this method, use setShapeNoPanelSelect(ShapeSelection.Shape) instead.
      Parameters:
      shape - ShapeSelection.Shape to select

    • setShapeNoPanelSelect

      public void setShapeNoPanelSelect(ShapeSelection.Shape shape)
      Select color in the settings without triggering the ShapeSelection selection update. IMPORTANT: if updating the settings from the linked ShapeSelection instance, always use this method and never setShapeNoPanelSelect(ShapeSelection.Shape) to avoid a cycle.
      Parameters:
      shape - ShapeSelection.Shape to select

    • getAction

      public GraphSettings.Action getAction()
      Get the currently selected action.
      Returns:

      Select action in the settings.
